name: Flatspace 2: The Rise of the Scarrid
name_original: Flatspace 2: The Rise of the Scarrid
description:
Flatspace 2: The Rise of the Scarrid is an arcade game developed by Cornutopia Software. It came out on 30-01-2006. It was published by Cornutopia Software.
Flatspace 2: The Rise of the Scarrid is available on PC.
